SELECT AGENCY_CD , AGENCY_NM FROM TB_CM_AGENCY WHERE 1=1 AND AGENCY_CD != '00000'
ORDER BY AGENCY_CD

/* USE : InstlAgencyMapper.getInstlAgencyDtl */ SELECT tca.AGENCY_CD , tca.AGENCY_NM , tca.OWNER_NM , tca.P_AGENCY_CD , tca.BIZ_NO , tca.BIZ_TYPE_CD , tca.BIZ_ITEM_CD , tca.BIZ_STORE_NM , tca.TEL_NO , tca.FAX_NO , tca.EMAIL_ADDR , tca.HMPG_ADDR , tca.POST_NO , tca.ADDR , tca.ADDR_DTL , tca.AREA_CD , tca.REMARK , tca.REG_DT , tca.REG_ID , tca.MOD_DT , tca.MOD_ID FROM TB_CM_AGENCY tca WHERE 1=1 AND tca.AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd}

/* USE : InstlAgencyMapper.getAgencyEmp */ SELECT tce.AGENCY_CD , tce.EMP_NO , tce.EMP_NM , tce.USER_ID , tce.SERVICE_FG , tce.MP_NO , tce.WEB_USE_YN FROM TB_CM_EMPLOYEE tce WHERE 1=1 AND tce.AGENCY_CD != '00000' AND tce.AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd} ORDER BY tce.EMP_NO

/* USE : InstlAgencyMapper.getAgencyEmpDtl */ SELECT tce.AGENCY_CD , tce.EMP_NO , tce.EMP_NM , tce.EMP_PWD , tce.WEB_USE_YN , tce.USER_ID , tce.MP_NO , tce.SERVICE_FG , (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '007' AND NMCODE_CD = tce.SERVICE_FG) AS SERVICE_FG_NM , tce.SMS_RECV_YN , tce.ADMIN_FG , (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '097' AND NMCODE_CD = tce.ADMIN_FG) AS ADMIN_FG_NM , tce.MAP_EMP_NO , tce.USE_YN , tce.REMARK , tce.REG_DT , tce.REG_ID , tce.MOD_DT , tce.MOD_ID FROM TB_CM_EMPLOYEE tce WHERE 1=1 AND tce.AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd} AND tce.EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY tce.EMP_NO
mapper.insert: /* USE : InstlAgencyMapper.insertWbUserInfo */ INSERT INTO TB_WB_USER_INFO ( USER_ID, USER_PWD, AUTH_GRP_CD, LOGIN_FAIL_CNT, LAST_PWD_CHG_DT, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( LOWER(#{userId}), #{userPwd}, #{authGrpCd}, 0, #{regDt}, #{webUseYn}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
mapper.update: /* USE : instlAgencyVO.saveWbUserInfo */ MERGE INTO TB_WB_USER_INFO twui USING (SELECT tce.USER_ID FROM TB_CM_EMPLOYEE tce WHERE tce.AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd} AND tce.EMP_NO = #{empNo} ) org ON (twui.USER_ID = org.USER_ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET twui.USE_YN = #{webUseYn}, twui.MOD_DT = #{modDt}, twui.MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( twui.USER_ID, twui.USER_PWD, twui.AUTH_GRP_CD, twui.LOGIN_FAIL_CNT, twui.USE_YN, twui.REG_DT, twui.REG_ID, twui.MOD_DT, twui.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{authGrpCd}, '0', #{webUseYn}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
